scripts.migrate:create: docker-compose -f deployments/docker-compose/docker-compose.dev.yml run migrations sh -c 'go run *.go create $1' --
scripts.migrate:up: docker-compose -f deployments/docker-compose/docker-compose.dev.yml run migrations sh -c 'go run *.go migrate'
scripts.migrate:down: docker-compose -f deployments/docker-compose/docker-compose.dev.yml run migrations sh -c 'go run *.go rollback'
